name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior IT Engineer with 13+ years of robust experience in cloud services, specifically with **Azure** and **Microsoft 365** environments. Proficient in implementing security frameworks using **Microsoft Defender**, **DLP**, **RBAC**, **OAuth**, **OIDC**, and **SAML**, ensuring compliance and data protection standards are met. Adept in leveraging **Microsoft Graph**, **Azure Policy**, and **Microsoft Sentinel** for incident response and governance alongside strong knowledge of **HTTP/S**, **TCP/IP**, and network fundamentals.

Skilled in using **PowerShell** to automate workflows and manage cloud infrastructure effectively, enhancing operational efficiency. Experienced in providing end-user collaboration solutions with tools such as **Teams**, **SharePoint**, and **Exchange Online**, enabling seamless communication and productivity.

Additionally, has a solid foundation in software development, with expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and mobile frameworks like **Flutter**. Proven ability to build high-performance applications, leveraging both frontend and backend technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Strong experience in deploying cloud-native systems and managing microservices architectures while adhering to compliance-driven development practices.
